article.class: fl-post post-2 page type-page status-publish hentry

h2.span: A School As Unique As You Are

div.p: The traditional approach to high school just doesn’t work for a lot of students.
That’s why we designed a high school as unique as you are. Marshall High School is different from other schools.

ul.li: A safe school environment without all the drama
Caring teachers focused on helping you graduate
The chance to work at your own pace so you can catch up or even graduate early
Flexible classes that work around your schedule
Job training so you can get a diploma AND a career

img.alt: Marshall HS students went and toured Lebanon Correctional today. What an eye opening experience for all of us. #stayoutoftrouble#befree

a.span: So proud of our Marshall High School graduate Rash

img.alt: So proud of our Marshall High School graduate Rashad Jones.

div.p: We know that every student learns differently. Our approach is to understand what each student needs to succeed and help them chart a path to graduation and a clear career path.
Our school is a proud member of Oakmont Education, a network of schools committed to reengaging youth and empowering them to make real, lasting changes in their lives.
